original:
High-Content Screening (HCS) instruments are primarily fluorescence microscopes integrated with advanced image analysis software. These systems streamline the process of capturing fluorescent images of cells, enabling rapid, automated, and unbiased assessments of experimental results.


The current state of HCS technology parallels the early development of automated DNA sequencers in the early 1990s. Automated DNA sequencing was a trans
